<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Wand of Choking Mist](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2272)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 138 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This blackened wood wand has a smoldering tip, emitting a slight trail of steam.

<document level="2" id="action-1819" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _obscuring mist_ or _solid fog_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"

>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell is [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"

>
Wand of Choking Mist (4th-Level Spell)
</title>

</traits>

</row>

</column>

The spell is [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290).
